name: Hoppy Protecter
description:
Hoppy Protect is a game made in 3 days for the One Button Game Jam

(note that the jam was a week long, i didn't have much time)

To play you use the space bar to jump/kick the bad guys

If you miss a bad guy, your happiness goes down, if it hits 0, you lose and restart

Web browser version might not work

Enjoy playing Hoppy Protect!

mem16 palette https://lospec.com/palette-list/mem16
